nodes.text: TIE Fighter 4 is the fourth issue of the canon comic book miniseries Star Wars: TIE Fighter. It was written by Jody Houser, illustrated by Rogê Antônio and Ig Guara, and published on July 17, 2019 by Marvel Comics.

A NEW MISSION! A betrayal from one of their own. Is the squadron even ready to fly again after so many losses? And who are these new pilots who think they're good enough to join the ranks of SHADOW WING?
